text: Paakabereka mwanasikana wake (Mariya) akati: “Tenzi vangu! Ndabereka mwanasikana,” uye Allah vaiziva zvikuru mwana waakanga abereka, “Uye murume haana kufanana nemukadzi, uye zvirokwazvo ndamutumidza zita rekuti Maryam (Mariya), uye zvirokwazvo, ndinotsvaga ruponeso mamuri (Allah) kwaari uye nevana vake kubva kuna Shaitwaan (Satani), akarambwa (akarengerwa).”
